chapter_description.p: The MATIO module provides support for reading and writing MAT-files, a widely used format for storing numerical data in MATLAB© and compatible environments.
It enables Nelson to check MAT-file validity, load and save workspace variables, and inspect file contents.
With this module, users can exchange data between Nelson and MATLAB©, making it a key component for interoperability in scientific and engineering workflows.

keyword.name: ismatfile
keyword.description: Checks if filename a valid .mat file

keyword.name: loadmat
keyword.description: load data from .mat file into Nelson's workspace.

keyword.name: whomat
keyword.description: List variables in an valid .mat file.

keyword.name: whosmat
keyword.description: List variables in an valid .mat file with sizes and types.
